item.title: Setting up my blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: I’ve been thinking about starting a personal blog around software and the like. I’ve recently been hanging around in the golang subreddit, and came across Hugo - a super-fast static site generator written in go. This is the start of my blog! Resources used for setting up the blog Hugo - Host on GitHub Creating a Hugo site on GitHub Pages by Dillon Gavlock GitHub Pages Basics I’m currently using the awesome hugo-coder theme.
